Name: [{"Name":"Banana Milk Coffee"},{"Name":"Cappuccino on Ice"},{"Name":"Creamy Ice Coffee"},{"Name":"Iced Caramel Macchiato"},{"Name":"Easy Iced Coffee"},{"Name":"Cold-Brewed Coffee"},{"Name":"Vietnamese Iced Coffee"},{"Name":"Turmeric Iced Coffee Latte"},{"Name":"Chocolate-y Iced Mocha"},{"Name":"Chocolate Peanut Butter Iced Coffee"},{"Name":"Caramel Coconut Iced Coffee"},{"Name":"Mocha Smoothie"}]
Description: [{"Description":"Adding creamy smooth banana milk to your morning cold brew makes it taste rich and delicious. Talk about an eye-opening good-for-you breakfast in a cup!"} , {"Description":"A mixture of strong coffee with sweetened condensed milk, half-and-half, and a touch of vanilla extract and serve over ice! Delicious on hot days."} , {"Description":"In this variation, coffee is combined with milk, half-and-half, a little sugar and vanilla, plus creme de cacao! Some folks prefer to use chocolate syrup in place of the chocolate liqueur."} , {"Description":"A perfect balance of coffee, vanilla, milk, and caramel makes a sweet and creamy summer drink."} , {"Description":"This is a 'cheaters' iced cappuccino - very no frills without compromising flavor. Instant coffee, sugar, and water in a sealable jar are shaken until nice and foamy then poured over ice and filled with milk."} , {"Description":"Coffee brewed slowly in cold water is less acidic than hot brewed. The coffee concentrate is used straight over ice or microwave half a mug of coffee and then add a half cup of boiling water for quick hot coffee. Develop your own ratio of coffee to water for your custom brew."} , {"Description":"Strong coffee over ice with sweetened condensed milk is an unbeatable Southeast Asian treat. Best served on hot summer days or as an evening treat."} , {"Description":"This anti-inflammatory iced coffee is spiced with turmeric, ginger, and cinnamon. It can be sweetened with your choice sweetener or not sweetened and left as a spiced iced coffee. I prefer Silk® Coconut Milk Beverage and I like to sweeten it with stevia."} , {"Description":"Cocoa, almond milk, and chocolate syrup get the day off to a sweet start. The almond milk gives it a smooth taste."} , {"Description":"This ingenious recipe starts with coffee ice cubes! Coffee ice cubes are blended with soy milk, chocolate syrup, a little peanut butter, some vanilla extract, and no-calorie sweetener until frothy. It has just enough coffee, chocolate and peanut butter flavor."} , {"Description":"A sweet treat iced cold brew coffee is a flavorful perk-up any time of day."} , {"Description":"Combine coconut milk, coffee, sugar, hot chocolate mix, and vanilla extract with ice and blend until smooth."}]
